text: Zafar Juraevich Usmanov (; 26 August 1937 â€“ 13 October 2021) was a Soviet and Tajik mathematician. He was a member of the Academy of Sciences of the Republic of Tajikistan.http://www.mathnet.ru/eng/person8447 Usmanov Zafar Dzuraevich He was a professor of Moscow State University and Technological University of Tajikistan. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Tajik people Category:Mathematicians Category:Moscow State University faculty
